title: Token List Rules
description: Rules for token lists, structural validation, and allowed/disallowed tokens/chains

allowedChains.description: Array of chain names or IDs that are allowed

disallowedChains.description: Array of chain names or IDs that are explicitly disallowed

minTokenLiquidityScore.description: Minimum liquidity score required for a token to be included

validNetworkTypes.description: Valid network types for the src directory, e.g., ['mainnet','testnet','layer2']

fileNamePattern.description: Regex pattern to validate list file names
